|brand = D-Link |model = DWR-118 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A2 |subrevision = E |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/12/2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/D-Link_DWR-118_rev_A2 |wlclass = AC1200 |series = DWR-118 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A;MT7620A, 1636-BMTH, FTP84W63H; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128FV; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6SB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E1510; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 1C:5F:2B |oui = 1C:5F:2B
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = Jboot<!--CDW57BDL_003 Jboot B1162 (JRecovery Version R1.2 2016/11/07 14:32)--> |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, J1,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = 3G/4G modem supports |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = dlink_DWR-118_2.4G_XXXX, dlink_DWR-118_5G_XXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WR7620A |manuf_rev = -183CA-DL REV.0.1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07BJB3YNC |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = soldered |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = none |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *WAN: 1x FE (10/100) ports *LAN: 3x FE (10/100) + 1x GbE (10/100/1000) ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 (3G/4G LTE modem backup support)
*2x external 5dBi Wi-Fi antennas (2.4 GHz & 5 GHz)
==Links of Interest== *[http://downloads.openwrt.org/snapshots/targets/ramips/mt7620/ Development Snapshots '''OpenWrt'''] :(''OpenWrt Downloads'') *[https://github.com/obsy/openwrt/commits/dwr118a2 Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWrt'''] :(''openwrt-obsy - Cezary Jackiewicz'') *[https://github.com/CHKDSK88/openwrt-1/tree/dwr118a2 Supported by an unofficial fork of '''OpenWrt'''] :(''openwrt-CHKDSK88 - Pawe≈Ç Dembicki'') *[http://eko.one.pl/forum/viewtopic.php?id=15977 On the '''eko.one.pl''' forums]

==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== J1 - 4-pin header (57600, 8n1)
{{/Serial info}}
